title: Lf Bronze 5 partners and Streaming!
body:
https://www.twitch.tv/nikki_mousiex



Add me in game if you wanna play or check out my stream? XD

replies.body: Why do you ppl post and tell me to add you when you can just add me?
I'm bronze I.. which is pretty much equal to V.. I'd be down for some games if you want tho! :)
